    Enhancements to the GermaParl Corpus

    Andreas Blaette (andreas.blaette@uni-due.de)

    2017-10-07

    Enhancing the GermaParl

    IDs for speeches

    library(polmineR)
library(data.table)

    As a first step, generate a copy of GERMAPARL corpus (named GERMAPARL2)

    registryDir <- path.expand("~/Lab/gitlab/GermaParl/inst/extdata/cwb/registry")
resetRegistry(registryDir = registryDir)

R <- RegistryFile$new("GERMAPARL")
R$setHome(file.path(dirname(registryDir), "indexed_corpora", "germaparl"))
R$write()

    Generate partitionBundle with speeches.

    P <- partition("GERMAPARL", text_type = "speech")
speeches <- as.speeches(P, gap = 500, mc = TRUE, progress = TRUE)

    Turn partitions into data.tables with column with ids in there.

    dts <- blapply(
  speeches,
  function(x) polmineR::as.data.table(polmineR:::as.regions(x), values = x@name),
  progress = TRUE, mc = FALSE
  )
dt <- data.table::rbindlist(dts)
data.table::setorderv(dt, cols = "V1", order = 1L)

    Encode it.

    encode(dt, corpus = "GERMAPARL", sAttribute = "text_speech_id")

    Check that creating a DocumentTermMatrix works.

    resetRegistry(registryDir = registryDir)
dtm <- as.DocumentTermMatrix("GERMAPARL", pAttribute = "word", sAttribute = "text_speech_id")

    Topicmodel - Optimierung

    library(polmineR)
library(topicmodels)
use("GermaParl")

dtm <- as.DocumentTermMatrix("GERMAPARL", pAttribute = "word", sAttribute = "text_speech_id")

# minimum document length 100 words
docs_to_drop_length <- names(which(slam::row_sums(dtm) < 100)) # less than 100
if (length(docs_do_drop_length) > 0)
  dtm <- dtm[-which(rownames(dtm) %in% docs_to_drop_length),]

# remove noisy words
to_drop <- noise(colnames(dtm), specialChars = NULL)
to_drop[["stopwords"]] <- c(
  to_drop[["stopwords"]],
  paste(
    toupper(substr(to_drop[["stopwords"]], 1, 1)),
    substr(to_drop[["stopwords"]], 2, nchar(to_drop[["stopwords"]])),
    sep = ""
  )
)


dtm <- dtm[,-which(terms_to_drop %in% colnames(dtm))]

# remove documents that are empty now
empty_docs <- which(slam::row_sums(dtm) == 0)
if (length(empty_docs) > 0) dtm <- dtm[-empty_docs,]


# k <- 100 # run 1
# k <- 150 # run 1
# k <- 200 # run 1
# k <- 250 # run 1
# k <- 300 # run 2
# k <- 350 # run 2
# k <- 400 # run 2
# k <- 450 # run 2

lda <- LDA(
  dtm, k = k, method = "Gibbs",
  control = list(burnin = 1000, iter = 1000, keep = 50, verbose = TRUE)
)

saveRDS(
  object = lda,
  file = sprintf("~/Lab/gitlab/GermaParl/data-raw/lda_germaparl_speeches_%d.RData", k)
)

    Topic Model Optimization

    dtm <- as.DocumentTermMatrix("GERMAPARL", pAttribute = "word", sAttribute = "text_speech_id")

fileRegex <- "lda_germaparl_speeches_(\\d+).RData"
fileSprintf <- "~/Lab/gitlab/GermaParl/data-raw/lda_germaparl_speeches_%d.RData"
filesInProjectDir <- list.files("~/Lab/gitlab/GermaParl/data-raw/", full.names = FALSE)
filesToGet <- grep(fileRegex, filesInProjectDir)
noTopics <- as.integer(gsub(fileRegex, "\\1", filesInProjectDir[filesToGet]))
LDAs <- lapply(
  setNames(noTopics, noTopics),
  function(N) readRDS(file = sprintf(fileSprintf, N))
)

control <- list(burnin = 1000, iter = 1000, keep = 50, verbose = TRUE)

result <- data.frame(topics = noTopics)
result[["Griffiths2004"]] <- ldatuning:::Griffiths2004(LDAs, control)
result[["CaoJuan2009"]] <- ldatuning:::CaoJuan2009(LDAs)
result[["Arun2010"]] <- ldatuning:::Arun2010(LDAs, dtm)
result[["Deveaud2014"]] <- ldatuning:::Deveaud2014(LDAs)

saveRDS(result, file = "~/Lab/gitlab/GermaParl/data-raw/lda_topic_optimization.RData")

    Visualisierung

    result <- readRDS("~/Lab/gitlab/epsa2017/lda_topic_optimization_context.RData")
FindTopicsNumber_plot(result)

    After optimization, write back result of optimal model to corpus.

    library(plprbt.data) # may be omitted later on
library(topicmodels)
library(magrittr)
library(data.table)

use("GermaParl")

cpos_dt_raw <- decode("GERMAPARL", sAttribute = "text_speech_id")
setkeyv(cpos_dt_raw, "text_speech_id")

topic_matrix <- topics(plprbt_lda_250, k = 5)
topic_dt <- data.table(
  id = colnames(topic_matrix),
  topics = apply(topic_matrix, 2, function(x) sprintf("|%s|", paste(x, collapse = "|"))),
  key = "id"
  )


cpos_dt <- cpos_dt_raw[topic_dt]
cpos_dt <- cpos_dt[is.na(cpos_left) == FALSE]
cpos_dt[["text_speech_id"]] <- NULL
setorderv(cpos_dt, cols = "cpos_left", order = 1L)

encode(cpos_dt, corpus = "GERMAPARL", sAttribute = "text_topics")

    Stemming

    words <- getTokenStream("GERMAPARL", pAttribute = "word")
words <- as.nativeEnc(words, from = getEncoding("GERMAPARL"))

library(SnowballC)
stems <- SnowballC::wordStem(words, language = "german")
